overview:
Co-founder Roy Solomon heads uTest’s project management efforts as well as the company’s product strategy. Based upon his extensive experience managing QA and testing for global companies, Roy recognized the need for an on demand “real-world” testing solution â€“ and the uTest concept was born.

Prior to uTest, Roy led QA and product teams at various consumer application software companies like IncrediMail and Blue Security. Roy holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer & Technical Management from the HiT Institute Israel.
